attributes.action: take any steps necessary to ensure that MPs may only vote on matters which affect their own constituents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In devolving some powers from Westminster to the Scottish Parliament, the government addressed one anomaly in UK democracy - that legislation applicable to Scotland ONLY could be made law by MPs for non-Scottish constituencies. Now the government needs to resolve the remaining anomaly - that MPs for Scotland can vote on legislation which only affects England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
